DESCRIPTOR.LABEL: Darwin Tree of Life Checklist
DESCRIPTOR.NAME: Darwin Tree of Life Checklist
DESCRIPTOR.DESCRIPTION: Minimum information required for reporting samples associated with the Darwin Tree of Life Project (https://www.darwintreeoflife.org/) which aims to sequence the genomes of all 60,000 species of eukaryotic organisms in Britain and Ireland.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Part and developmental stage of organism
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Anatomical and developmental descriptions of the sample site or source material

FIELD.LABEL: organism part
FIELD.NAME: organism part
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The part of organism's anatomy or substance arising from an organism from which the biomaterial was derived, excludes cells.

FIELD.LABEL: lifestage
FIELD.NAME: lifestage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: the age class or life stage of the organism at the time of collection.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: non-sample terms

FIELD.LABEL: project name
FIELD.NAME: project name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the project within which the sequencing was organized

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Collection event information

FIELD.LABEL: collected_by
FIELD.NAME: collected_by
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name of persons or institute who collected the specimen

FIELD.LABEL: collection date
FIELD.NAME: collection date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date of sampling, either as an instance (single point in time) or interval. In case no exact time is available, the date/time can be right truncated i.e. all of these are valid ISO8601 compliant times: 2008-01-23T19:23:10+00:00; 2008-01-23T19:23:10; 2008-01-23; 2008-01; 2008.

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the country or sea. Country or sea names should be chosen from the INSDC country list (http://insdc.org/country.html).

TEXT_VALUE.VALUE: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (latitude)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (latitude)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by latitude and longitude. The values should be reported in decimal degrees and in WGS84 system

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (longitude)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (longitude)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by latitude and longitude. The values should be reported in decimal degrees and in WGS84 system

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the specific region name followed by the locality name.

FIELD.LABEL: identified_by
FIELD.NAME: identified_by
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: name of the expert who identified the specimen taxonomically

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (depth)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (depth)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Depth is defined as the vertical distance below surface, e.g. for sediment or soil samples depth is measured from sediment or soil surface, respectivly. Depth can be reported as an interval for subsurface samples.

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (elevation)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (elevation)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The elevation of the sampling site as measured by the vertical distance from mean sea level.

FIELD.LABEL: habitat
FIELD.NAME: habitat
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: description of the location of the sample material. please use EnvO terms where possible: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/envo

FIELD.LABEL: identifier_affiliation
FIELD.NAME: identifier_affiliation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: the university, institution, or society responsible for identifying the specimen.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sample collection

FIELD.LABEL: sample derived from
FIELD.NAME: sample derived from
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference to parental sample(s) or original run(s) that the assembly is derived from. The referenced samples or runs should already be registered in INSDC. This should be formatted as one of the following. A single sample/run e.g. ERSxxxxxx OR a comma separated list e.g. ERSxxxxxx,ERSxxxxxx OR a range e.g. ERSxxxxxx-ERSxxxxxx

FIELD.LABEL: sample same as
FIELD.NAME: sample same as
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference to sample(s) that are equivalent. The referenced sample(s) should already be registered in INSDC. This should be formatted as one of the following. A single sample e.g. ERSxxxxxx OR a comma separated list e.g. ERSxxxxxx,ERSxxxxxx

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Organism characteristics

FIELD.LABEL: sex
FIELD.NAME: sex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: sex of the organism from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: relationship
FIELD.NAME: relationship
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: indicates if the specimen has a known parental, child, or sibling relationship to any other specimens.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: General collection event information
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: General information on the collection event.

FIELD.LABEL: collecting institution
FIELD.NAME: collecting institution
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the institution to which the person collecting the specimen belongs. Format: Institute Name, Institute Address

FIELD.LABEL: GAL
FIELD.NAME: GAL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: the name (or acronym) of the genome acquisition lab responsible for the sample.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Pointer to physical material
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: References to sample or sample source material in physical resources

FIELD.LABEL: specimen_voucher
FIELD.NAME: specimen_voucher
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: identifier for the specimen from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: specimen_id
FIELD.NAME: specimen_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: unique id that serves to link the samples, images, vouchers and DNA barcodes that derive from one individual organism.

FIELD.LABEL: GAL_sample_id
FIELD.NAME: GAL_sample_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: unique name assigned to the sample by the genome acquisition lab.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Infraspecies information
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Formal and informal infraspecies taxonomic information

FIELD.LABEL: culture_or_strain_id
FIELD.NAME: culture_or_strain_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: living, culturable, named laboratory strain that sequenced material is derived from.
